position: Operations Manager at FENIX. |Ex-CIRC (Acquired by Bird) | Ex-FETCHR

experience.title: Senior Operations Manager GCC
experience.description: •	Head of Regional Operations for the leading light electric vehicles platform in the Middle East, operating across 5 countries – UAE, Saudi Arabia, Turkey, Qatar, Bahrain •	Led 200 member multi-site operation team of ops managers, specialists, supervisors, team leaders, technicians and associates•	Drove ops efficiency program to improve vehicle utilization and reduce costs per vehicle, achieving best-in-class unit economics and EBITDA profitability•	Later drove end-to-end operations expansion into high growth ecommerce enablement – deliveries, fulfillment, payments, lending – powering USD 50m+ in GMV across 1000+ merchant partners, 500k+ consumers and 200+ driver partners with 40% m-o-m growth over 1.5 years•	Spearheaded the integration of cutting-edge online payment systems such as Tabby (Buy Now, Pay Later) and payment links, managing financial transactions worth over 2 million AED monthly•	Played a pivotal role in a cross-functional team, focusing on delivery optimization, customer satisfaction enhancement, premium account management, and strategic growth initiatives
experience.description_html: • Head of Regional Operations for the leading light electric vehicles platform in the Middle East, operating across 5 countries – UAE, Saudi Arabia, Turkey, Qatar, Bahrain • Led 200 member multi-site operation team of ops managers, specialists, supervisors, team leaders, technicians and associates• Drove ops efficiency program to improve vehicle utilization and reduce costs per vehicle, achieving best-in-class unit economics and EBITDA profitability• Later drove end-to-end operations expansion into high growth ecommerce enablement – deliveries, fulfillment, payments, lending – powering USD 50m+ in GMV across 1000+ merchant partners, 500k+ consumers and 200+ driver partners with 40% m-o-m growth over 1.5 years• Spearheaded the integration of cutting-edge online payment systems such as Tabby (Buy Now, Pay Later) and payment links, managing financial transactions worth over 2 million AED monthly• Played a pivotal role in a cross-functional team, focusing on delivery optimization, customer satisfaction enhancement, premium account management, and strategic growth initiatives

experience.title: Operational Specialist
experience.description: •	Pioneering team member in launching CIRC micromobility services across Doha, Abu Dhabi, and Riyadh •	Optimized scooter availability through precise timing and placement, targeting the right customer segments•	Implemented KPIs for daily performance assessment of drivers and helpers•	Spearheaded the introduction of CIRC Daily, an innovative online delivery service in the UAE
